about.title: BUILDING_ROBUST_SOLUTIONS. CLEAN_CODE_MINDSET.
about.bio_1: Full-stack developer passionate about building robust and elegant web solutions. Main stack: Laravel, Vue.js, TypeScript, Go, Flutter, Docker.
about.bio_2: Based in Kolwezi, DRC. Strong commitment to clean code, problem-solving, and delivering production-ready systems. Exploring Cloud, AI, and DevOps for scalable innovation.
about.bio_3: Core values: Building reliable applications, contributing to open source, and exploring the future of IT with curiosity and ambition.

logs.detail: Joined Jkantech as Full-stack Developer. Building production systems with Laravel, Vue.js, TypeScript. Learning Go & Docker.
Graduated from ISC Lubumbashi. Launched freelance career delivering web apps, dashboards, and APIs.
Deep dive into Laravel ecosystem. Internship at Afrisoft building internal tools and improving UIs.
Started programming studies at ISC Lubumbashi. Learning PHP, MySQL, and web development fundamentals.

uzaraka.title: Uzaraka
uzaraka.description: Modern classifieds platform for DRC. Post, browse, and manage listings easily. Features include smart search, secure messaging, and performance tracking.

jumpdatatable.title: Jump Datatable
jumpdatatable.description: Composer package for dynamic tables in PHP. Responsive, sortable, searchable, and paginated tables. Optimized for TailwindCSS and Bootstrap.

laraapistarter.title: LaraApiStarter
laraapistarter.description: Production-ready Laravel 12 REST API starter with clean Action & DTO architecture. Focused on security, performance, and developer experience.
